div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2000 Taranto, Calabria, 1908 (1051) Burial: c. 235 B.C. (K) Contents: 120 AR Taras: st. (Per. VIII) Disposition: Prof. Hartwig; Vlasto 2 (Cat. 838, 965); possibly Cat. 854 (there ascribed to N. 1057 = no. 1984 above) and 855-7 there ascribed to N. 1058 (= no. 1929 above) should also be attributed to this find. Cat. 243, 280, 292, 350, 375, 380, 413-5 (all there ascribed to this hd.) should probably be reattributed to no. 1916 above (Ionian Shore) found in the same yr. Note from M. P. Vlasto
